          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(e)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">stock
certificates from each of the Sellers who is selling Shares (including all
Initial Sellers and all Joining Sellers (including, in each case, to the extent
that such Sellers constitute Exercising Optionholders)) representing such
Shares, duly endorsed in blank or accompanied by stock transfer powers and with
all requisite stock transfer tax stamps attached and otherwise sufficient to
transfer the Shares to Purchaser free and clean of all Liens;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(f)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">documents
of transfer from each of the Sellers who is selling Company Securities not
constituting Shares (including any Seller who is selling unexercised Company
Warrants) with all requisite stock transfer tax stamps attached and otherwise
sufficient to transfer such Company Securities to Purchaser free and clean of
all Liens;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(g)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">counterpart
signature pages to this Agreement executed by a number of Joining Sellers which,
together with the Initial Sellers, hold, as of the Closing Date, no less than
(A)&#160;ninety-seven percent (97%) of the then-outstanding Shares (which
ninety-seven percent (97%) shall include one-hundred percent (100%) of any
then-outstanding Shares which are issued following the date of this Agreement
(including upon the exercise of any Company Options)) and (B)&#160;one-hundred
percent (100%) of any Company Securities (other than Shares) which would not, by
their terms, terminate automatically as of the Closing, pursuant to which such
Joining Sellers shall become parties to this Agreement as if Initial Sellers
hereunder;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(h)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">certificates
of good standing dated not more than five (5) Business Days prior to the Closing
Date with respect to the Company issued by the Secretary of State of the State
of Delaware and for each state in which the Company is qualified to do business
as a foreign corporation;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">all
instruments and documents necessary to release each of the Liens set forth in
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule </font><a href="#_Ref263347528"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.6(i)</font></a> other than
Permitted Exceptions, including appropriate UCC financing statement amendments
(termination statements);</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(j)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
certificate indicating the Company Transaction Expenses as of the close of
business on the day immediately preceding the Closing Date, pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242706000"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.15</font></a>;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(k)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
certificate indicating the amount of Indebtedness to be repaid as of the
Closing, pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242706003"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.17</font></a>;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(l)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
resignation of the existing directors of the Company with a written
acknowledgment from each such resigning director that he has no claim whatever
against the Company whether in respect of compensation for loss of office,
damages, loans or otherwise, provided that, subject to the Company&#8217;s compliance
with <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263703899"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.20(a)</font></a> hereof,
such acknowledgement shall not have any effect on such director&#8217;s right to
indemnification or insurance pursuant to this Agreement or
otherwise;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(m)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
certificates described in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref261172617"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">7.1(f)</font></a>;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(n)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">an
affidavit that complies with U.S. Treasury Regulations Section&#160;1.897-2(h)
to the effect that the Company Securities are not &#8220;United States real property
interests&#8221; as defined in Section&#160;897(c) of the Code (a &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">FIRPTA
Affidavit</font>&#8221;);</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(o)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">an
opinion of Stradling Yocca Carlson &amp; Rauth, counsel to the Company, in
substantially the form of <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit&#160;E</font> hereto
and permitting reliance thereon by Purchaser;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(p)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">a copy of
each Parachute Payment Waiver, in substantially the form of <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit H</font> (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Parachute Payment
Waiver</font>&#8221;) hereto, executed by a Person designated to execute such a waiver
pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263339907"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.26</font></a>;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(q)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">all
instruments and documents necessary to release any and all Liens other than
Permitted Exceptions, including appropriate UCC financing statement amendments
(termination statements); and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(r)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">an Option
Termination Agreement in the form attached as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit&#160;I</font> from
each Non-Exercising Optionholder duly executed by such Non-Exercising
Optionholder.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.7</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">No Further Ownership Rights in the
Company</font>.&#160;&#160;Upon payment of the amounts specified in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242609893"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.3(a)</font></a> through <a href="#_Ref263345260"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.3(f)</font></a> to the
Paying Agent, the Escrow Agent and the Representative Account, the Sellers shall
cease to have any rights pertaining to such Company Securities or the Company
other than the right to receive the Earnout Payments, if any, the remaining
portions, if any of the Adjustment Holdback and (if applicable) the Appraisal
Holdback, in each case, upon the release thereof and any remaining Escrow
Balance upon the release thereof, in each case, in accordance with the terms
hereof.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.8</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Dissenting
Shares; Release of Appraisal Holdback.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">If,
following the Closing, there are any Remaining Shares not acquired by Purchaser
as of the Closing then, subsequent to the Closing and the consummation of the
Merger contemplated by&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263431767"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.19</font></a>, all
Dissenting Shares will be converted into the right to receive such consideration
as may be determined to be due to the Dissenting Stockholder holding such
Dissenting Shares under Delaware General Corporation Law and the California
General Corporation Law, as applicable.&#160;&#160;If a Dissenting Stockholder
forfeits his, her or its right to appraisal under the Delaware General
Corporation Law and the California General Corporation Law, as applicable, or
properly withdraws his, her or its demand for appraisal of Dissenting Shares,
then, as of the occurrence of such event, such holder&#8217;s Dissenting Shares shall
cease to be Dissenting Shares and shall be converted into and represent the
right to receive the consideration payable in respect of such Shares pursuant to
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263431767"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.19</font></a>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Company shall give the Purchaser (i) prompt notice of any written demands for
appraisal of any Shares of Common Stock, withdrawals of such demands, and any
other instruments that relate to such demands received by the Company and (ii)
the opportunity to direct all negotiations and proceedings with respect to
demands for appraisal under the Delaware General Corporation Law or the
California General Corporation Law, as applicable.&#160;&#160;The Company shall
not, except with the prior written consent of the Purchaser or as required by
applicable Law, make any payment with respect to any demands for appraisal of
Shares or offer to settle or settle any such demands.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(c)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)&#160;The
costs of conducting any appraisal proceedings (including any reasonable fees of
attorney and advisors) as well as (ii)&#160;any amounts paid to any Dissenting
Stockholder on account of such Dissenting Stockholder&#8217;s assertion of appraisal
rights, shall be</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">7</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">paid by
Purchaser from (or, if paid by the Company, shall be deemed to reduce) the
Appraisal Holdback (and, to the extent that the Appraisal Holdback is
insufficient first by the Sellers&#8217; Representatives on behalf of the Sellers from
the Representative Account and, if still insufficient, from the Escrow
Account).</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(d)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Within
five (5) Business Days following such time as (i)&#160;all Dissenting
Stockholders have either been paid, pursuant to applicable Law for their
Dissenting Shares or have ceased to be Dissenting Shareholders and been paid for
their Shares in accordance with <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263431767"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.19</font></a>, and
(ii)&#160;Purchaser owns one-hundred percent (100%) of the Company Securities,
Purchaser shall release the remaining balance, if any, of the Appraisal Holdback
to the Paying Agent (to be allocated among the Sellers and the Non-Exercising
Optionholders in accordance with <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit&#160;B</font>
hereto).</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.9</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Net Working Capital
Adjustment</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Closing Date Purchase Price
Adjustment</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Not later
than three (3) Business Days prior to the Closing Date, the Company shall
provide Purchaser with an estimated consolidated balance sheet of the Company as
of immediately after the Closing (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Estimated Closing Balance
Sheet</font>&#8221;) and a statement of the estimated Closing Working Capital (as
defined in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263342185"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.9(b)(i)</font></a> below),
derived from the Estimated Closing Balance Sheet (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Estimated Closing Working
Capital</font>&#8221;).&#160;&#160;The Estimated Closing Balance Sheet and Estimated
Closing Working Capital shall be prepared by the Company in accordance with GAAP
applied using the same accounting methods, practices, principles, policies and
procedures, with consistent classifications, judgments and valuation and
estimation and accrual methodologies that were used in the preparation of the
Company&#8217;s audited Financial Statements for the most recent fiscal year end, as
if such Estimated Closing Balance Sheet and Estimated Closing Working Capital
were being prepared and audited as of a fiscal year end.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">If
Estimated Closing Working Capital is less than Target Working Capital, then the
Base Purchase Price payable at Closing will be decreased by the positive
difference between Estimated Closing Working Capital and Target Working Capital
(the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Estimated
Closing Working Capital Shortfall</font>&#8221;).&#160;&#160;If Estimated Closing
Working Capital is greater than Target Working Capital, then the Base Purchase
Price payable at Closing will be increased by the positive difference between
Estimated Closing Working Capital and Target Working Capital (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Estimated Closing Working
Capital Excess</font>&#8221;).&#160;&#160;&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Target Working
Capital</font>&#8221; shall be $1,000,000.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Post-Closing Date Purchase
Price Adjustment</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Following
the Closing, the Base Purchase Price shall be adjusted as provided herein to
reflect the difference between Closing Working Capital and Estimated Closing
Working Capital.&#160;&#160;&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Closing Working
Capital</font>&#8221; means the Net Working Capital of the Company as of immediately
after the Closing, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">provided</font>, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">however</font>, that if, as
of the Closing Date, one or more of the individuals listed on <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263339907"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.26</font></a> has not
executed a Parachute Payment Waiver as provided in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263341334"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.26(a)</font></a><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">,</font> the Company shall
include in its calculation of Closing</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">8</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Net
Working Capital, a deemed liability equal to the portion of the value of the tax
deductions lost pursuant to Section 280G of the Code which result from the
acceleration of vesting for Company Options and Accelerated Shares and shall
reduce the Company&#8217;s Net Working Capital on a dollar by dollar basis to reflect
the loss of such Tax deductions (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">280G
Deduction</font>&#8221;).&#160;&#160;For purposes of the preceding sentence, the value
of the acceleration of the Company Options and Accelerated Shares shall be
determined pursuant to Treasury Regulations Section 1.280G-1, Q&amp;A-12 and
Q&amp;A-13.&#160;&#160;The value of the lost Tax deduction shall deemed to be
equal to (A)&#160;the dollar amount of the Tax deduction the Company could have
as a result the acceleration of vesting for Company Options and Accelerated
Shares had Parachute Payment Waivers been exercised, multiplied by
(B)&#160;39.5%.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Within 45
days following the Closing Date, Purchaser shall deliver to the Sellers&#8217;
Representatives a consolidated balance sheet of the Company as of immediately
after the Closing (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Closing Balance
Sheet</font>&#8221;) audited by the Company&#8217;s accountants and a statement of Closing
Working Capital derived from the Closing Balance Sheet (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Closing Working Capital
Statement</font>&#8221;).&#160;&#160;The Closing Balance Sheet and the Closing Working
Capital Statement shall be prepared in accordance with GAAP applied using the
same accounting methods, practices, principles, policies and procedures, with
consistent classifications, judgments and valuation, estimation and accrual
methodologies that were used in the preparation of the Company&#8217;s audited
Financial Statements for the most recent fiscal year end, as if such Closing
Balance Sheet was as of a fiscal year end.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(iii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Closing Balance Sheet and the Closing Working Capital Statement (and the
computation of Closing Working Capital indicated thereon) delivered by Purchaser
to the Sellers&#8217; Representatives shall be conclusive and binding upon the parties
unless the Sellers&#8217; Representatives, within 15 days after delivery to the
Sellers&#8217; Representatives of the Closing Balance Sheet and the Closing Working
Capital Statement, notifies Purchaser in writing that the Sellers&#8217;
Representatives disputes any of the amounts set forth therein, specifying the
nature of the dispute and the basis therefor.<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: text-top">&#160;</font>
The parties shall in good faith attempt to resolve any dispute and, if the
parties so resolve all disputes, the Closing Balance Sheet and the Closing
Working Capital Statement (and the computation of Closing Working Capital
indicated thereon), as amended to the extent necessary to reflect the resolution
of the dispute, shall be conclusive and binding on the parties.&#160;&#160;If
the parties do not reach agreement in resolving the dispute within 15 days after
notice is given by the Sellers&#8217; Representatives to Purchaser pursuant to the
second preceding sentence, the parties shall submit the dispute to the
accounting firm of Deloitte &amp; Touche, LLP, or, if such firm will not act, to
such other &#8220;big four&#8221; accounting firm which is mutually agreeable to the parties
(the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Arbiter</font>&#8221;)
for resolution.&#160;&#160;Promptly, but no later than 20 days after acceptance
of its appointment as Arbiter, the Arbiter shall determine (it being understood
that in making such determination, the Arbiter shall be functioning as an expert
and not as an arbitrator), based solely on written submissions by Purchaser and
the Sellers&#8217; Representatives, and not by independent review, only those issues
in dispute and shall render a written report as to the resolution of the dispute
and the resulting computation of the Closing Working Capital which shall be
conclusive and binding on the parties.<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: text-top">&#160;</font>
All proceedings conducted by the Arbiter shall take place in Orange County,
California.&#160;&#160;In resolving any disputed item, the Arbiter
(x)&#160;shall be bound by the provisions of this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263345837"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.9</font></a> and
(y)&#160;may not assign a value to any item greater than the greatest value for
such items claimed by either party or less than the smallest value for such
items claimed by either party.&#160;&#160;The fees, costs and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">9</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">expenses
of the Arbiter shall be allocated to and borne by Purchaser and the Sellers
based on the inverse of the percentage that the Arbiter&#8217;s determination (before
such allocation) bears to the total items in dispute as originally submitted to
the Arbiter with the Sellers&#8217; portion paid first from the Adjustment Holdback
and, if needed, by the Sellers&#8217; Representatives from the Representative Account
and, if needed, from the Escrow Account.&#160;&#160;By way of example and not of
limitation, if Purchaser and Sellers&#8217; Representatives have a dispute over $100
and the Arbiter awards $60 to Sellers (60% of the amount in dispute) and $40 to
Purchaser (40% of the amount in dispute), Purchaser would bear 60% of the fees,
costs and expenses of the Arbiter and Sellers would bear 40% of the fees, costs
and expenses of the Arbiter.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(iv)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Upon
final determination of Closing Working Capital as provided in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242614701"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.9(b)(iii)</font></a>
above, (A)&#160;if Closing Working Capital is greater than Estimated Closing
Working Capital, the Base Purchase Price shall be increased by the excess of
Closing Working Capital over Estimated Closing Working Capital and Purchaser
shall promptly, but no later than five (5) Business Days after such final
determination, pay the amount of such difference, together with interest thereon
from the Closing Date to the date of payment thereof, to the Paying Agent to be
allocated among the Sellers and the Non-Exercising Optionholders in accordance
with <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit&#160;B</font>
hereto, and (B)&#160;if Closing Working Capital is less than Estimated Closing
Working Capital, the Base Purchase Price shall be decreased by the excess of
Estimated Closing Working Capital over Closing Working Capital and the Sellers
shall promptly, but no later than five (5) Business Days after such final
determination, pay to Purchaser (including by way of offset against the
Adjustment Holdback) the amount of such difference, together with interest
thereon from the Closing Date to the date of payment thereof as determined
below.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(v)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Any
remaining amounts of the Adjustment Holdback, after deduction pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242608722"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.9(b)(iv)</font></a> above,
if any, shall be paid by the Purchaser to the Paying Agent, to be allocated
among the Sellers and the Non-Exercising Optionholders in accordance with <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit&#160;B</font>
hereto, not later than five (5) Business Days after the Closing Balance Sheet is
determined final.&#160;&#160;If the Adjustment Holdback is insufficient to
satisfy any amount due to the Purchaser pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242608722"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.9(b)(iv)</font></a> above,
such excess amount will be paid by the Sellers&#8217; Representatives on behalf of the
Sellers and the Purchaser shall not be required to demand such payment from the
Escrow Account.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(vi)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">For the
purposes of this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242608383"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.9(b)</font></a>, interest
will be payable at the &#8220;prime&#8221; rate, as announced by <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">The Wall Street
Journal</font>, Eastern Edition, from time to time to be in effect, calculated
based on a 365 day year and the actual number of days elapsed.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">2.10</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Earnout Payments</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">No later
than 90 days after the last day of each Earnout Year, the Purchaser will provide
notice to the Sellers&#8217; Representatives (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Earnout Notice</font>&#8221;) of
the actual Deemed Net Revenue for the relevant Earnout Year.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Subject
to subsections&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(f)</font>, <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(g)</font> and <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(j)</font> through <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(m)</font> of this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263345937"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10</font></a>, for each of
the Earnout Years ending December&#160;31, 2011, December&#160;31, 2012 and
December&#160;31, 2013 (each such Earnout Year, a &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Base Earnout Year</font>&#8221;)
in which Deemed Net Revenue meets or exceeds Target Net Revenue for such Earnout
Year, Purchaser shall pay to Paying Agent (for</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">10</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">distribution
to Sellers in accordance with <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit&#160;B</font>
hereto) $25,000,000 (each such $25,000,000 payment, a &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Base Earnout
Payment</font>&#8221;).&#160;&#160;The parties acknowledge and agree that to the
extent that Deemed Net Revenue is less than Target Net Revenue for any Base
Earnout Year (i)&#160;no Earnout shall be payable by Purchaser for such Base
Earnout Year and (ii)&#160;Deemed Net Revenue for such Base Earnout Year shall
not be carried forward to any subsequent Earnout Year for purposes of
determining whether Target Net Revenue for such subsequent Earnout Year is met
or exceeded (nor for any other purpose).</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(c)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Subject
to subsections&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(g)</font> and <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(j)</font> through <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(m)</font> of this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263345953"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10</font></a>, for each
Earnout Year in which Deemed Net Revenue exceeds Target Net Revenue for such
Earnout Year, Purchaser shall pay to Paying Agent (for distribution to Sellers
in accordance with <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit&#160;B</font>
hereto) an amount equal to the amount by which the Deemed Net Revenue for such
Earnout Year exceeds the Target Net Revenue for such Earnout Year, multiplied by
0.5 (each such payment, an &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Excess Earnout
Payment</font>&#8221;).</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(d)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In the
event that due to external conditions (whether or not market related)
Purchaser&#8217;s actual selling price for the Product during any Earnout Year (based
on unbundled, arms&#8217;-length sales to un-Affiliated third parties) is lower, by
ten percent (10%) or more, than the applicable Deemed Product Price for such
Earnout Year (the percentage by which the actual Product price is lower than the
Deemed Product Price, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Product Reduction
Percentage</font>&#8221;):</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
parties shall adjust the Deemed Product Price for (A)&#160;such Earnout Year and
(B)&#160;for each subsequent Earnout Year (as set forth on <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Annex&#160;1</font> hereto),
by a percentage amount equal to the Product Reduction Percentage;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
parties shall adjust the Target Product Revenue for (A)&#160;such Earnout Year
and (B)&#160;for each subsequent Earnout Year (as set forth on <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Annex&#160;1</font> hereto)
by a percentage amount equal to the Product Reduction Percentage;
and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(iii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
parties shall recalculate Target Net Revenue for (A)&#160;such Earnout Year and
(B)&#160;for each subsequent Earnout Year (as set forth on <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Annex&#160;1</font> hereto)
by adding (X)&#160;Target Procedure Revenue for each such Earnout Year (as
adjusted, if applicable, pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263345953"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10</font></a><a href="#_Ref261193495"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(e)(ii)</font></a> below) to
(Y)&#160;Target Product Revenue for each such Earnout Year, as adjusted pursuant
to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref261193294"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10(d)(ii)</font></a>
above.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchaser
may not adjust the Deemed Product Price and Target Product Revenue pursuant to
this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref261193293"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10(d)</font></a> more than
once per Earnout Year.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(e)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In the
event that due to external conditions (whether or not market related) the actual
amount charged by Purchaser for each Procedure performed during any Earnout Year
(utilizing Products sold in unbundled, arms&#8217;-length sales to un-Affiliated third
parties) is lower, by ten percent (10%) or more, than the applicable Deemed
Procedure Price for such Earnout Year (the percentage by which the actual
Procedure charge is lower than the Deemed Procedure Price, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Procedure Reduction
Percentage</font>&#8221;):</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
parties shall adjust the Deemed Procedure Price for (A)&#160;such Earnout Year
and (B)&#160;for each subsequent Earnout Year (as set forth on <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Annex&#160;1</font> hereto),
by a percentage amount equal to Procedure Reduction Percentage;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">11</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
parties shall adjust the Target Procedure Revenue for (A)&#160;such Earnout Year
and (B)&#160;for each subsequent Earnout Year (as set forth on <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Annex&#160;1</font> hereto)
by a percentage amount equal to the Procedure Reduction Percentage;
and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(iii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
parties shall recalculate Target Net Revenue for (A)&#160;such Earnout Year and
(B)&#160;for each subsequent Earnout Year (as set forth on <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Annex&#160;1</font> hereto)
by adding (X)&#160;Target Product Revenue for each such Earnout Year (as
adjusted, if applicable, pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref261193294"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10(d)(ii)</font></a>
above) to (Y)&#160;Target Procedure Revenue for each such Earnout Year, as
adjusted pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref261193495"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10(e)(ii)</font></a>
above.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchaser
may not adjust the Deemed Procedure Price and Target Procedure Revenue pursuant
to this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref261193494"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10(e)</font></a> more than
once per Earnout Year.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(f)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notwithstanding
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref260930524"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10(b)</font></a>, no Base
Earnout Payment shall be owed by Purchaser for the Base Earnout Years ending
December&#160;31, 2012 and December&#160;31, 2013 unless on or before
January&#160;1, 2012 (with respect to the Base Earnout Year ending
December&#160;31, 2012) or January&#160;1, 2013 (with respect to the Base
Earnout Year ending December&#160;31, 2013), the FDA has granted approval of, or
clearance for, the use of the Company Femtosecond Laser in the creation of
full-thickness corneal incisions for cataract surgery.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(g)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notwithstanding
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref260930524"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10(b)</font></a> and <a href="#_Ref260930532"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10(c)</font></a>, no
Earnout Payments (Base Earnout Payment or Excess Earnout Payments) shall be owed
by Purchaser:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">for the
Earnout Year ending December&#160;31, 2013 unless (A)&#160;on or before
January&#160;1, 2013, the FDA has granted a 510(k) Clearance <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">or</font> (B)&#160;on or
before July 1, 2013, the FDA has granted an Investigational Device exemption, in
each case, for the use of the Company Femtosecond Laser in astigmatic
keratotomy;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">for the
Earnout Year ending December&#160;31, 2014 unless on or before January&#160;1,
2014, the FDA has granted <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">either</font> a 510(k)
Clearance or an Investigational Device exemption, in each case, for the use of
the Company Femtosecond Laser in astigmatic keratotomy, and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(iii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">for the
Earnout Year ending December&#160;31, 2015 unless on or before January&#160;1,
2015, the FDA has granted <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">either</font> a 510(k)
Clearance or an Investigational Device exemption, in each case, for the use of
the Company Femtosecond Laser in astigmatic keratotomy.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(h)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Earnout Notice delivered by Purchaser to the Sellers&#8217; Representatives shall be
conclusive and binding upon the parties unless the Sellers&#8217; Representatives,
within twenty (20) days after delivery to the Sellers&#8217; Representatives of the
Earnout Notice, notifies Purchaser in writing that the Sellers&#8217; Representatives
disputes any of the amounts set forth therein or whether the Diligent Efforts
required pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263435450"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10</font></a><a href="#_Ref263435444"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(n)</font></a> have been
made, specifying the nature of the dispute and the basis therefor.<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: text-top">&#160;</font>
The parties shall in good faith attempt to resolve any dispute and, if the
parties so resolve all disputes, the Earnout Notice, as amended to the extent
necessary to reflect the resolution of the dispute, shall be conclusive and
binding on the parties.&#160;&#160;If the parties do not reach agreement in
resolving the dispute within twenty (20) days after notice is given by the
Sellers&#8217; Representatives to Purchaser pursuant to the second</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">12</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">preceding
sentence, the parties shall submit the dispute to the Arbiter for
resolution.&#160;&#160;Promptly, but no later than twenty (20) days after
acceptance of its appointment as Arbiter, the Arbiter shall determine (it being
understood that in making such determination, the Arbiter shall be functioning
as an expert and not as an arbitrator), based solely on written submissions by
Purchaser and the Sellers&#8217; Representatives, and not by independent review, only
those issues in dispute and shall render a written report as to the resolution
of the dispute and the resulting computation of the Earnout Payment which shall
be conclusive and binding on the parties.<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: text-top">&#160;</font>
All proceedings conducted by the Arbiter shall take place in metropolitan
Dallas/Fort Worth, Texas.&#160;&#160;In resolving any disputed item, the Arbiter
(x)&#160;shall be bound by the provisions of this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263346326"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10</font></a> and
(y)&#160;may not assign a value to any item greater than the greatest value for
such items claimed by either party or less than the smallest value for such
items claimed by either party.&#160;&#160;The fees, costs and expenses of the
Arbiter shall be allocated to and borne by Purchaser and the Sellers based on
the inverse of the percentage that the Arbiter&#8217;s determination (before such
allocation) bears to the total items in dispute as originally submitted to the
Arbiter (as such methodology is more fully described in the final sentence of
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref264629973"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.9(b)(iii)</font></a>) with
the Sellers&#8217; portion paid first by offset from one or more Earnout Payments
(without being required to offset or deduct such amount from any Escrowed
Earnout Amount) and, if needed, by the Sellers&#8217; Representatives from the
Representative Account and, if needed, from the Escrow Account.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Subject
to subsections&#160;(j) and (k) of this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263346350"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10</font></a>, upon final
determination of any Earnout Payment as provided in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242674242"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10(h)</font></a> above,
Purchaser shall promptly, but no later than five (5) Business Days after such
final determination, pay the amount of such Earnout Payment to the Paying Agent,
to be allocated among the Sellers in accordance with <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit&#160;B</font>
hereto.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(j)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notwithstanding
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263346389"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10(i)</font></a> (and
subject to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref261177636"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.10(k)</font></a> below)
with respect to any Earnout Payment paid on account of the Earnout Years ending
December&#160;31 of 2011, 2012 and 2013, Purchaser shall pay only seventy-five
percent (75%) of the amount of such Earnout Payment to the Paying Agent (to be
allocated among the Sellers in accordance with <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit&#160;B</font>
hereto) and shall pay twenty-five percent (25%) of amount of such Earnout
Payment to the Escrow Agent (any such amount, an &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Escrowed Earnout
Amount</font>&#8221;), to be deposited into the Escrow Account.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(k)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Any
amount to be paid to the Paying Agent (to be allocated among the Sellers in
accordance with <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit&#160;B</font>
hereto), whether one-hundred percent (100%) or seventy-five percent (75%) of any
Earnout Payment, as applicable, shall be subject to offset as provided in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref261200913"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.6(a)(ii)</font></a> and <a href="#_Ref263346471"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.7(a)(ii)</font></a>
hereof.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(l)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
amount of all Earnout Payments shall be proportionately reduced to account for
the percentage of the Shares (other than Dissenting Shares) that were acquired
by the Purchaser in the Merger.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(m)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notwithstanding
the foregoing, the Earnout Payments shall not exceed $382,500,000 in the
aggregate (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Earnout
Cap</font>&#8221;).</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(n)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Diligent
Efforts</font>.&#160;&#160;Purchaser shall use Diligent Efforts to maximize
Deemed Net Revenue during the Earnout Years.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">13</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
