        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.20</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">such
Merger consideration need not provide for any deductions or holdbacks therefrom
of the types deducted or held back pursuant to this Agreement (including any
Adjustment Holdback, Appraisal Holdback, contributions to the Initial Escrow
Balance, any Escrowed Earnout Amount or the Representative Expense Amount) and,
if such deductions or holdbacks are not provided for, an appropriate adjustment
may be made to the per-Share Merger consideration to take into account the fact
that such deductions will not be made therefrom.&#160;&#160;The Merger
consideration shall be paid by Purchaser from (or, if paid by the Company, shall
be deemed to reduce) the Appraisal Holdback.&#160;&#160;The Merger shall be
completed by merging a newly formed subsidiary of the Purchaser into the
Company.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.21</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Directors and Officers
Insurance</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Prior to
the Closing, the Company shall obtain and fully pay for, a &#8220;claims-made&#8221; &#8220;tail&#8221;
policy under the Company&#8217;s existing directors&#8217; and officers&#8217; insurance policy,
which (i) has an effective term of six years from the Closing Date, (ii) covers
only those persons who are currently covered by the Company&#8217;s directors&#8217; and
officers&#8217; insurance policy in effect as of the date hereof and only for actions
and omissions occurring on or prior to the Closing Date, and (iii) contains
terms and conditions (including, without limitation, coverage amounts) that are
no less advantageous, when taken as a whole, to those applicable to the current
directors and officers of the Company.&#160;&#160;This <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section </font><a href="#_Ref263358247"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.20</font></a> shall
survive the consummation of the Merger, is intended to benefit each Company
Indemnified Person, shall be binding on all successors and assigns of the
Company and Purchaser, and shall be enforceable by the Company Indemnified
Persons.&#160;&#160;Notwithstanding any provision of this Agreement to the
contrary, nothing in this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section </font><a href="#_Ref263358247"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.20</font></a> shall affect
any rights of Purchaser to indemnification under this Agreement with respect to
events occurring prior to, or circumstances existing at, the Closing
Date.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Contingent
on the Company&#8217;s having met its obligation under <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263703987"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.20</font></a><a href="#_Ref263703899"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(a)</font></a>, from and
after the Closing until the sixth (6<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: text-top">th</font>)
anniversary of the Closing Date, Purchaser shall, and shall cause the Company
to, fulfill and honor in all respects the obligations of the Company to its
directors and officers as of immediately prior to the Closing Date (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Company Indemnified
Persons</font>&#8221;) pursuant to any indemnification provisions under the Company&#8217;s
certificate of incorporation or bylaws as in effect on the date of this
Agreement and pursuant to any indemnification agreements between the Company and
such Company Indemnified Parties existing as of the Agreement Date (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Company Indemnification
Provisions</font>&#8221;), with respect to claims arising out of acts or omissions
occurring at or prior to the Closing Date.&#160;&#160;In connection therewith,
Purchaser shall advance expenses to the Company Indemnified Persons as incurred
to the fullest extent provided for under the Company Indemnification
Provisions.&#160;&#160;Any claims for indemnification made under this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section </font><a href="#_Ref263703987"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.20</font></a><a href="#_Ref265662611"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(b)</font></a> on or prior
to the sixth (6<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: text-top">th</font>)
anniversary of the Closing Date shall survive such anniversary until the final
resolution thereof.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.22</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Employee
Matters</font>.&#160;&#160;As of and following the Closing Date, Purchaser will
either (a)&#160;continue the employee benefit plans in effect on the Closing
Date, (b) permit employees of the Company who continue employment with Purchaser
or the Company following the Closing Date (&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Continuing
Employees</font>&#8221;), and, as applicable, their eligible dependents, to
participate in the employee benefit plans, programs or policies (including
without limitation any plan intended to qualify within the meaning of Section
401(a) of the Code and any vacation, sick, per personal</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">59</font></div>

          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

      </div><br>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">time off
plans or programs) of Purchaser on terms no less favorable than those provided
to similarly situated employees of Purchaser, or (c) a combination of clauses
(a) and (b).&#160;&#160;To the extent Purchaser elects to have Continuing
Employees and their eligible dependents participate in its employee benefit
plans, program or policies following the Closing Date, (i) each such Continuing
Employee will receive credit for purposes of eligibility to participate and
vesting under such plan for years of service with the Company (or any of its
Subsidiaries), and (ii) Purchaser will cause any and all pre-existing condition
limitations, eligibility waiting periods and evidence of insurability
requirements under any group health plans of Purchaser in which such employees
and their eligible dependents will participate to be waived and will provide
credit for any co-payments and deductibles prior to the Closing Date for
purposes of satisfying any applicable deductible, out-of-pocket or similar
requirements under any such plans that may apply after the Closing
Date.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.23</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Resignation of
Directors.</font>&#160;&#160;Upon Closing the directors of the Company shall
deliver to the Company signed resignations from their seats on the Board of
Directors.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.24</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">401(k) Plan.</font>&#160;&#160;At
Purchaser&#8217;s written request, delivered no later than thirty (30) days after the
date hereof, the Company shall terminate the 401(k) Plan (the "<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">401(k) Plan</font>")
effective immediately prior to the Closing, shall cease all further
contributions to the 401(k) Plan for pay periods beginning on and after the
Closing Date and, to the extent the 401(k) Plan provides for loans to
participants, shall cease making any such additional loans effective immediately
prior to the Closing Date.&#160;&#160;If Purchaser so directs the Company to
terminate the 401(k) plan, the Company agrees to cooperate with Purchaser after
the Closing Date to amend the 401(k) Plan in order to bring the 401(k) Plan into
compliance with all applicable laws and regulations, to vest all participants in
their accounts, to distribute all such accounts to the extent permitted under
applicable laws and regulations and to bear all expenses that may apply in
connection with obtaining a favorable determination letter from the Internal
Revenue Service with respect to the tax-qualified status of the 401(k) Plan at
its termination.&#160;&#160;If Purchaser opts not to instruct the Company to
terminate the 401(k) Plan, nothing herein shall be deemed to prevent the Company
or Purchaser from terminating the 401(k) Plan following the Closing in
accordance with applicable Law.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.25</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Certain
Waivers</font>.&#160;&#160;Each Seller (including any &#8220;Significant Investor&#8221; as
defined in any executory Right of First Offer and Co-Sale Agreement relating to
shares of the Company to which the stockholders of the Company are a party),
severally, and the Company, hereby waives any and all first refusal, first offer
or veto or other rights under the certificate of incorporation of the Company or
any agreement to which it is a party with respect to the execution of this
Agreement and the consummation of the transactions contemplated
hereby.&#160;&#160;Additionally, each holder of the Company&#8217;s Preferred Stock
hereby waives any right to treat the transactions contemplated hereby as a
&#8220;waiver, dissolution or winding up&#8221; of the Company under the certificate of
incorporation of the Company or any agreement to which it is a
party.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.26</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Valuation
Opinion</font>.&#160;&#160;The parties acknowledge that Purchaser has retained
Houlihan, Lokey, Howard &amp; Zukin, Inc. to deliver a valuation opinion as to
the Per-Share Fair Market Value on the Closing Date (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Valuation
Opinion</font>&#8221;).&#160;&#160;The parties hereto agree to use, if available when
required, the amount of the Per-Share Fair Market Value derived therefrom for
all Tax purposes relating to the transactions under this Agreement which are
dependent upon the</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>

      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">fair
market value of the Company&#8217;s common stock including, but not limited to, the
calculation of the amount of the fair market value of Shares received upon the
exercise of Company Options prior to Closing.&#160;&#160;Nothing herein shall
obligate Purchaser to share the entirety of the Valuation Opinion (other than
the result thereof) with Sellers or the Company.&#160;&#160;Notwithstanding the
foregoing, in the event that prior to the Valuation Opinion becoming available,
the Company obtains the Parachute Payment Approval, the Company shall clearly
advise all stockholders approving such Parachute Payment Approval that
(i)&#160;the Valuation Opinion is forthcoming, (ii)&#160;the Per-Share Fair
Market Value derived therefrom may be materially different from the fair market
value being used in connection with the Parachute Payment Approval and
(iii)&#160;the Per-Share Fair Market Value will ultimately be dispositive in
respect of the payments approved by such Parachute Payment
Approval.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">6.27</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Parachute Payment
Waiver</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Company shall deliver to Purchaser, prior to the initiation of the requisite
stockholder approval procedure under <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263339907"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.26</font></a><a href="#_Ref263339908"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(b)</font></a>, a Parachute
Payment Waiver, in substantially the form attached as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit H</font>, from each
Person identified on <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263339907"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.26</font></a>, which lists
each individual who is, with respect to the Company and/or any ERISA Affiliate,
a &#8220;disqualified individual&#8221; (within the meaning of Section&#160;280G of the Code
and the regulations promulgated thereunder), as determined immediately prior to
the initiation of the requisite stockholder approval procedure under <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263339907"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.26</font></a>, and who
might otherwise have, receive or have the right or entitlement to receive a
parachute payment under Section&#160;280G of the Code as a result of (i) the
accelerated vesting or &#8220;cashing out&#8221; of such Person&#8217;s Company Options and/or the
termination of employment or service with the Company or Purchaser before, upon
or following the Closing, (ii) any Change of Control Payment, and/or (iii) the
receipt of any Company Options within the 12-month period ending on the Closing
Date, pursuant to which each such Person shall agree to waive any and all right
or entitlement to the accelerated vesting, payments, benefits, options and stock
referred to in clauses (i), (ii) and (iii) to the extent the value thereof
exceeds 2.99 times such Person&#8217;s base amount determined in accordance with
Section&#160;280G of the Code and the regulations promulgated thereunder, unless
the requisite stockholder approval of such accelerated vesting, payments,
benefits, options and stock is obtained pursuant to this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263339907"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.26</font></a>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Company shall use its commercially reasonable efforts to obtain the approval
(the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Parachute
Payment Approval</font>&#8221;) by such number of shareholders of the Company as is
required by the terms of Section&#160;280G(b)(5)(B) so as to render the
parachute payment provisions of Section&#160;280G of the Code inapplicable to
any and all accelerated vesting payments, benefits, options and/or stock
provided pursuant to agreements, contracts or arrangements that might otherwise
result, separately or in the aggregate, in the payment of any amount and/or the
provision of any benefit that would not be deductible by reason of
Section&#160;280G of the Code, with such shareholder vote to be obtained in a
manner which satisfies all applicable requirements of Section&#160;280G(b)(5)(B)
of the Code and the regulations promulgated thereunder.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>

        </div>

          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ARTICLE
VII&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">CONDITIONS
TO CLOSING</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">7.1</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Purchaser&#8217;s Conditions to
Closing</font>.&#160;&#160;The Purchaser&#8217;s obligations to consummate the
purchase of the Company Securities hereunder is subject to the fulfillment,
prior to or at the Closing, of each of the following conditions (any or all of
which may be waived by the Purchaser in its sole discretion):</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)&#160;the
Company Fundamental Representations and the representations in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242678865"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.13(b)</font></a> and <a href="#_Ref263704473"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.13(l)</font></a> shall be
true and correct in all respects, and (ii)&#160;all other representations and
warranties in <a href="#_Ref263358291"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ARTICLE IV</font></a> shall
be true and correct in all material respects (ignoring for such purpose, any
&#8220;materiality,&#8221; or &#8220;Material Adverse Effect&#8221; qualifiers in such representations
and warranties) in each case, as of the date of this Agreement and as of the
Closing as though made at and as of the Closing (except to the extent such
representations and warranties expressly speak as of an earlier date in which
case such representations and warranties qualified as to materiality shall be
true and correct, and those not so qualified shall be true and correct in all
material respects, on and as of such earlier date);</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
Seller Fundamental Representations shall be true and correct in all respects
with respect to each Seller, as of the date of this Agreement (or, with respect
to any Joining Seller, as of the date as such Joining Seller executes a
counterpart signature page) and as of the Closing as though made at and as of
the Closing (except to the extent such representations and warranties expressly
speak as of an earlier date in which case such representations and warranties
qualified as to materiality shall be true and correct, and those not so
qualified shall be true and correct in all material respects, on and as of such
earlier date);</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(c)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
Company and the Sellers shall have performed and complied in all material
respects with all obligations and agreements required in this Agreement to be
performed or complied with by them on or prior to the Closing Date;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(d)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">there
shall not have been or occurred any event, change, occurrence or circumstance
that, individually or in the aggregate with any such events, changes,
occurrences or circumstances, has had a Material Adverse Effect since the
Balance Sheet Date (regardless of whether or not such events or changes are
inconsistent with the representations or warranties of the Sellers contained
herein);</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(e)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">no Legal
Proceedings shall have been instituted or threatened or claim or demand made
against the Sellers, the Company or Purchaser, seeking to enjoin, restrain or
prohibit, or to obtain substantial damages with respect to, the consummation of
the transactions contemplated hereby, and there shall not be in effect any Order
by a Governmental Authority of competent jurisdiction restraining, enjoining or
otherwise prohibiting the consummation of the transactions contemplated
hereby;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(f)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchaser
shall have received a certificate signed by each of the Chief Executive Officer
and Chief Financial Officer of the Company, each in form and substance
reasonably satisfactory to Purchaser, dated the Closing Date, to the effect that
each of the</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">conditions
specified above in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242706955"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">7.1</font></a><a href="#_Ref261170197"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(a)</font></a> and <a href="#_Ref242714104">(c)</a> through <a href="#_Ref261170192">(e)</a> have been
satisfied in all respects;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: text-top">&#160;</font>provided
that with respect to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242706955"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">7.1</font></a><a href="#_Ref242714104"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(c)</font></a> and <a href="#_Ref261170192">(e)</a>, the Chief Executive Officer and Chief Financial
Officer of the Company shall only be required to certify as to the
Company;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(g)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)&#160;the
waiting period under the HSR Act shall have expired or early termination shall
have been granted and the Company shall have obtained or made any other consent,
waiver, approval, Order, Permit or authorization of, or registration,
declaration or filing with, any U.S. Governmental Authority or pursuant to U.S.
Law required to be obtained or made by them in connection with the execution and
delivery of this Agreement and the Seller Documents or the consummation of the
transactions contemplated hereby or thereby and (ii)&#160; the Company shall
have obtained all consents, waivers and approvals referred to in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule </font><a href="#_Ref242706955"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">7.1</font></a><a href="#_Ref261204800"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(g)</font></a> hereof in a
form satisfactory to Purchaser in its reasonable discretion;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(h)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(A)&#160;The
following Restricted Sellers shall have entered into employment agreements in
the form attached hereto as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit&#160;J</font>:
(x)&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">each</font>
of Ronald Kurtz, Tibor Juhasz, Eric Weinberg, Carlos Suarez, Gergely Zimanyi and
Shelley Thunen; and (y)&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">at</font> <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">least</font> <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">seven</font> (7) <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">of</font> Michael Karavitis,
Ferenc Raksi, Scott Delong, Peter Goldstein, Keith Watanabe, Illya Goldschleger,
Kosta Vardin, Melvin Sarayba and Jesse Buck; (B)&#160;such agreements shall be
in full force and effect and (C)&#160;all of such persons shall be willing and
able to perform in accordance with such agreements;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">any
Restricted Seller who has not executed an employment agreement in the form
attached hereto as <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exhibit&#160;J</font> shall
have executed a stand-alone non-competition agreement containing the same
restrictions contained in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242698644"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.7</font></a>
hereof;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(j)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the Side
Letter dated as of the date hereof shall still be in full force and
effect;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(k)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
Sellers&#8217; Representatives and the Escrow Agent shall have executed the Escrow
Agreement;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(l)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchaser
shall have received the items described in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref261173606"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.5</font></a> and <a href="#_Ref261173555"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.6</font></a>;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(m)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">all
corporate and other proceedings in connection with the approval and fulfillment
of this Agreement (and any of its ancillary documents, schedules or exhibits),
including all transactions contemplated at the Closing and all documents
incident thereto, including the implementations of the provision thereof, shall
have been taken in a manner satisfactory in form and substance to the Purchaser
and the Purchaser shall have received counterpart original / certified or other
copies of such documents; and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(n)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchaser
shall have acquired not less than (A)&#160;ninety-seven percent (97%) of the
then-outstanding Shares (which ninety-seven percent (97%) shall include
one-hundred percent (100%) of any then-outstanding Shares which are issued
following the date of this Agreement (including upon the exercise of any Company
Options)) and (B)&#160;one-hundred percent (100%) of any Company Securities
(other than Shares) which would not, by their terms, terminate automatically as
of the Closing.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>

        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>

          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">63</font></div>

          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;

        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(o)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Each of
the Restricted Sellers shall have exercised all Company Options held by such
Restricted Seller and will be selling any Shares issued upon the exercise
thereof to Purchaser at the Closing.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(p)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">There
shall not, following the Closing be any obligation on the part of the Company to
pay any compensation to any holders of stock options, warrants or other
convertible securities in relation to such options, warrants or convertible
securities.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">7.2</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Sellers&#8217; Conditions to
Closing</font>.&#160;&#160;The Sellers&#8217; obligations to consummate the sale of
the Company Securities to the Purchaser at the Closing is subject to the
fulfillment, prior to or at the Closing, of each of the following conditions
(any or all of which may be waived by the Sellers&#8217; Representatives in their sole
discretion):</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
representations and warranties of Purchaser set forth in this Agreement
qualified as to materially shall be true and correct, and those not so qualified
shall be true and correct in all material respects, in each case, as of the date
of this Agreement and as of the Closing as though made at and as of the Closing
(except to the extent such representations and warranties expressly relate to an
earlier date in which case such representations and warranties qualified as to
materially shall be true and correct, and those not so qualified shall be true
and correct in all material respects, on and as of such earlier
date);</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchaser
shall have performed and complied in all material respects with all obligations
and agreements required by this Agreement to be performed or complied with by
Purchaser on or prior to the Closing Date;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(c)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">there
shall not be in effect any Order by a Governmental Authority of competent
jurisdiction restraining, enjoining or otherwise prohibiting the consummation of
the transactions contemplated hereby;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(d)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">the
waiting period under the HSR Act shall have expired or early termination shall
have been granted and Purchaser shall have obtained or made any other consent,
approval, waiver, Order, Permit or authorization of, or registration,
declaration or filing with, any Governmental Authority required to be obtained
or made by it in connection with the execution and delivery of this Agreement
and the Purchaser Documents or the consummation of the transactions contemplated
hereby or thereby;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(e)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Purchaser and the Escrow Agent shall have executed the Escrow Agreement;
and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(f)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchaser
shall have made the payments required by <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section </font><a href="#_Ref242611853"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">2.3</font></a>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ARTICLE
VIII&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">INDEMNIFICATION,
REMEDIES AND FREEDOM TO OPERATE</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">8.1</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Survival of Representations and
Warranties</font>.&#160;&#160;The representations and warranties of the parties
contained in this Agreement, any certificate delivered pursuant hereto or any
Transaction Document shall survive the Closing through and including the two (2)
year</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">64</font></div>

      </div><br>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">anniversary
of the Closing Date; provided, however, that (a)&#160; the Fundamental
Representations shall survive the Closing indefinitely, (b)&#160;the
representations and warranties set forth in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref239173013"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.10</font></a> (Taxes), <a href="#_Ref239173792"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.16</font></a> (Employee
Benefits Plans) and <a href="#_Ref239174045"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.21</font></a>
(Environmental Matters) shall survive the Closing until ninety (90) days
following the expiration of the applicable statute of limitations with respect
to the particular matter that is the subject matter thereof (c)&#160;the
representations and warranties set forth in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242678865"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.13(b)</font></a>
(Ownership or License to Intellectual Property) <a href="#_Ref263358772">4.13(l)</a> (Absence of Employee Interest in Intellectual
Property), as such representations and warranties apply to Patents listed on
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Schedule&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242678860"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.13(a)</font></a>, shall
survive until six (6) years following the expiration of such Patents, and
(d)&#160;the representations and warranties of Purchaser set forth in <a href="#_Ref263358823"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ARTICLE V</font></a> shall
survive the Closing indefinitely (in each case, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Survival Period</font>&#8221;);
provided, however, that any obligations under <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711047"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2(a)(i)</font></a> and <a href="#_Ref263358862"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2(b)(i)</font></a> shall
not terminate with respect to any Losses as to which the Person to be
indemnified shall have given notice (stating in reasonable detail the basis of
the claim for indemnification)&#160;to the indemnifying party in accordance with
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711080"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.4(a)</font></a> before the
termination of the applicable Survival Period.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">8.2</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Indemnification</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Following
the Closing, subject to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711089"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.1</font></a> and<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711093"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.3</font></a> hereof and
with respect to Taxes, only to the extent not addressed by <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section </font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a> hereof, the
Sellers hereby agree, jointly and severally (except with respect to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711148"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2</font></a><a href="#_Ref242711156"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(a)</font></a><a href="#_Ref242711144"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(ii)</font></a>, severally,
but not jointly), to indemnify and hold Purchaser, the Company, and their
respective directors, officers, employees, Affiliates, agents, attorneys,
representatives, successors and assigns (collectively, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Purchaser Indemnified
Parties</font>&#8221;) harmless from and against, and pay to the applicable Purchaser
Indemnified Parties the amount of, any and all losses, liabilities, claims,
obligations, deficiencies, demands, judgments, damages, interest, fines,
penalties, claims, suits, actions, causes of action, assessments, awards, costs
and expenses (including reasonable costs of investigation and defense and
reasonable attorneys&#8217; and other professionals&#8217; fees), whether or not involving a
third party claim (individually, a &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Loss</font>&#8221; and,
collectively, &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Losses</font>&#8221;):</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">based
upon, attributable to or resulting from the failure of any of the
representations or warranties made by the Sellers or the Company in this
Agreement (other than in <a href="#_Ref263359005"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ARTICLE III</font></a>) or
in any Company Document to be true and correct in all respects at and as of the
date hereof and at and as of the Closing Date;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">based
upon, attributable to or resulting from the failure of any of the
representations and warranties made by each Seller in <a href="#_Ref263359005"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ARTICLE III</font></a> or in
any Seller Document to be true and correct in all respects as of the date hereof
and at and as of the Closing Date;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(iii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">based
upon, attributable to or resulting from the breach of any covenant or other
agreement on the part of the Sellers under this Agreement or any Seller Document
or Company Document;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(iv)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">arising
from or related to any fees, commissions, or like payments by any Person having
acted or claiming to have acted, directly or indirectly, as a broker, finder or
financial advisor for the Sellers or the Company in connection with the
transactions contemplated by this Agreement; and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
