      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Subject
to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711089"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.1</font></a> and <a href="#_Ref242711093"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.3</font></a>, Purchaser
hereby agrees to indemnify and hold the Sellers and their respective Affiliates,
stockholders, agents, attorneys, representatives, successors and permitted
assigns (collectively, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Seller Indemnified
Parties</font>&#8221;) harmless from and against, and pay to the applicable Seller
Indemnified Parties the amount of any and all Losses:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">based
upon, attributable to or resulting from the failure of any of the
representations or warranties made by Purchaser in this Agreement or in any
Purchaser Document to be true and correct in all respects at the date hereof and
as of the Closing Date;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">based
upon, attributable to or resulting from the breach of any covenant or other
agreement on the part of Purchaser under this Agreement or any Purchaser
Document; and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(iii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">arising
from or related to any fees, commissions, or like payments by any Person having
acted or claiming to have acted, directly or indirectly, as a broker, finder or
financial advisor for the Purchaser in connection with the transactions
contemplated by this Agreement.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(c)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The right
to indemnification or any other remedy based on representations, warranties,
covenants and agreements in this Agreement, or any Transaction Document shall
not be affected by any investigation conducted at any time, or any knowledge
acquired (or capable of being acquired) at any time, whether before or after the
execution and delivery of this Agreement or the Closing Date, with respect to
the accuracy or inaccuracy of, or compliance with, any such representation,
warranty, covenant or agreement.&#160;&#160;The waiver of any condition based on
the accuracy of any such representation or warranty, or on the performance of or
compliance with any such covenant or agreements, will not affect the right to
indemnification or any other remedy based on such representations, warranties,
covenants and agreements.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">8.3</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Limitations on Indemnification for
Breaches of Representations and Warranties</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">An
indemnifying party shall not have any liability under <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711047"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2(a)(i)</font></a> or <a href="#_Ref263358862"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2(b)(i)</font></a> hereof
unless the aggregate amount of Losses incurred by the indemnified parties and
indemnifiable thereunder based upon, attributable to or resulting from the
failure of any of the representations or warranties to be true and correct
exceeds $1,000,000 (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Deductible</font>&#8221;) and, in
such event, the indemnifying party shall be required to pay the amount of such
Losses in excess of the Deductible; provided that the Deductible limitation
shall not apply to (i)&#160;Losses related to the failure to be true and correct
of any of the (A)&#160;Fundamental Representations or (B)&#160;representations
and warranties set forth in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref239173013"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.10</font></a> (Taxes), <a href="#_Ref242678865"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.13(b)</font></a>
(Ownership or License to Intellectual Property) <a href="#_Ref263358772"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.13(l)</font></a> (Absence
of Employee Interest in Intellectual Property), <a href="#_Ref239173792"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.16</font></a> (Employee
Benefits Plans), <a href="#_Ref239174045"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.21</font></a>
(Environmental Matters), (ii)&#160;the indemnity in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a> (Tax Matters)
(including to the extent that such indemnity overlaps with any indemnity under
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711047"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2(a)(i)</font></a>), or
(iii)&#160;Losses arising from any fraud or intentional misrepresentation (the
matters in the foregoing clauses (i), (ii) and (iii) the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Cap Carve
Outs</font>&#8221;).</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">66</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">An
indemnifying party shall not have any liability under <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711047"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2(a)(i)</font></a> or <a href="#_Ref263358862"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2(b)(i)</font></a> for an
aggregate amount of Losses exceeding $91,875,000 (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Cap</font>&#8221;) provided, that
(i)&#160;the Cap shall not apply to any Losses related to the Cap Carve Outs,
(ii)&#160;any amounts paid on account of the Cap Carve Outs shall not be
aggregated with other amounts paid under <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711047"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2(a)(i)</font></a> or <a href="#_Ref263358862"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2(b)(i)</font></a> for
purposes of determining whether the Cap has been met or exceeded.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(c)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Sellers shall not have any liability under <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711047"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2(a)(i)</font></a> once
Purchaser is barred from recovery of Sellers&#8217; fifty percent (50%) of the
economic burden of any FTO Payments due to application of the FTO Cap pursuant
to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref261203099"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.7(c)</font></a>, provided,
that the foregoing limitation shall not apply to any Losses related to the Cap
Carve Outs.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(d)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">For
purposes of determining the failure of any representations or warranties to be
true and correct, the breach of any covenants and agreements, and calculating
Losses hereunder, any &#8220;materiality,&#8221; &#8220;Material Adverse Effect,&#8221; &#8220;knowledge&#8221; or
&#8220;Knowledge&#8221; qualifications in the representations, warranties, covenants and
agreements shall be disregarded.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(e)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Sellers shall have no right of contribution or other recourse against the
Company or its directors, officers, employees, Affiliates, agents, attorneys,
representatives, assigns or successors for any Third Party Claims asserted by
Purchaser Indemnified Parties, it being acknowledged and agreed that the
covenants and agreements of the Company are solely for the benefit of the
Purchaser Indemnified Parties.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">8.4</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Indemnification
Procedures</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">A claim
for indemnification for any matter not involving a third party claim may be
asserted by notice to the party from whom indemnification is sought; provided,
however, that failure to so notify the indemnifying party shall not preclude the
indemnified party from any indemnification which it may claim in accordance with
this <a href="#_Ref263359535"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ARTICLE
VIII</font></a>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">In the
event that any Legal Proceedings shall be instituted or that any claim or demand
shall be asserted by any third party in respect of which indemnification may be
sought under <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711148"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2</font></a> hereof
(regardless of the limitations set forth in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711093"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.3</font></a>) (a &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Third Party Claim</font>&#8221;),
the indemnified party shall promptly cause written notice of the assertion of
any Third Party Claim of which it has knowledge which is covered by this
indemnity to be forwarded to the indemnifying party.&#160;&#160;The failure of
the indemnified party to give reasonably prompt notice of any Third Party Claim
shall not release, waive or otherwise affect the indemnifying party&#8217;s
obligations with respect thereto except to the extent that the indemnifying
party can demonstrate actual loss and prejudice as a result of such
failure.&#160;&#160;Subject to the provisions of this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711337"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.4</font></a>, the
indemnifying party shall have the right, at its sole expense, to be represented
by counsel of its choice, which must be reasonably satisfactory to the
indemnified party, and to defend against, negotiate, settle or otherwise deal
with any Third Party Claim which relates to any Losses indemnified against
hereunder; provided that the indemnifying party shall have acknowledged in
writing to the indemnified party its unqualified obligation to indemnify the
indemnified party as provided hereunder.&#160;&#160;If the indemnifying party
elects to defend against, negotiate, settle or otherwise deal with any Third
Party Claim which relates to any Losses indemnified by it hereunder, it shall
within five (5) days of the indemnified party&#8217;s written notice of the
assertion</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">67</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">of such
Third Party Claim (or sooner, if the nature of the Third Party Claim so
requires) notify the indemnified party of its intent to do so; provided, that
(i)&#160;the indemnifying party must conduct the defense of the Third Party
Claim actively and diligently thereafter in order to preserve its rights in this
regard, (ii)&#160;the indemnifying party shall have acknowledged in writing to
the indemnified party its unqualified obligation to indemnify the indemnified
party as provided hereunder, (iii)&#160;after giving effect to any applicable
Deductible, caps and the limitations on recourse specified in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263706598"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.6</font></a>, it is
reasonably anticipated that, as between the indemnifying party and the
indemnified parties, the indemnifying party will actually bear financial
responsibility for fifty percent (50%) or more of any Losses resulting from such
Third Party Claim, and (iv)&#160;the indemnifying party can be reasonably
anticipated to have the financial wherewithal (including as a result of any
monies in the Escrow Account or any anticipated Earnout Payments) to indemnify
the indemnified party if the Third-Party Claim is successful.&#160;&#160;If the
indemnifying party elects not to defend against, negotiate, settle or otherwise
deal with any Third Party Claim which relates to any Losses indemnified against
hereunder, fails to notify the indemnified party of its election as herein
provided or contests its obligation to indemnify the indemnified party for such
Losses under this Agreement, the indemnified party may defend against,
negotiate, settle or otherwise deal with such Third Party Claim.&#160;&#160;If
the indemnified party defends any Third Party Claim, then the indemnifying party
shall reimburse the indemnified party for the expenses of defending such Third
Party Claim upon submission of periodic bills.&#160;&#160;If the indemnifying
party shall assume the defense of any Third Party Claim, the indemnified party
may participate, at his or its own expense, in the defense of such Third Party
Claim; provided, however, that such indemnified party shall be entitled to
participate in any such defense with separate counsel at the expense of the
indemnifying party if (i)&#160;so requested by the indemnifying party to
participate or (ii)&#160;in the reasonable opinion of counsel to the indemnified
party, a conflict or potential conflict exists between the indemnified party and
the indemnifying party that would make such separate representation advisable;
and provided, further, that the indemnifying party shall not be required to pay
for more than one such counsel for all indemnified parties in connection with
any Third Party Claim.&#160;&#160;The parties hereto agree to provide reasonable
access to the other to such documents and information as may be reasonably
requested in connection with the defense, negotiation or settlement of any such
Third Party Claim.&#160;&#160;Notwithstanding anything in this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711337"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.4</font></a> to the
contrary, neither the indemnifying party nor the indemnified party shall,
without the written consent of the other party, settle or compromise any Third
Party Claim or permit a default or consent to entry of any judgment unless the
claimant or claimants and such party provide to such other party an unqualified
release from all liability in respect of the Third Party Claim.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(c)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">After any
final decision, judgment or award shall have been rendered by a Governmental
Authority of competent jurisdiction and the expiration of the time in which to
appeal therefrom, or a settlement shall have been consummated, or the
indemnified party and the indemnifying party shall have arrived at a mutually
binding agreement, in each case with respect to a Third Party Claim hereunder,
the indemnified party shall forward to the indemnifying party notice of any sums
due and owing by the indemnifying party pursuant to this Agreement with respect
to such matter and the indemnifying party shall pay all of such remaining sums
so due and owing to the indemnified party in accordance with <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711337"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.4</font></a>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">68</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">8.5</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Tax Matters</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Tax
Indemnification</font>.&#160;&#160;The Sellers hereby agree, jointly and
severally, to be liable for and to indemnify and hold the Purchaser Indemnified
Parties harmless from and against, and pay to the Purchaser Indemnified Parties
the amount of any and all Losses in respect of (i)&#160;all Taxes of the Company
(or any predecessor thereof)&#160;(A)&#160;for any taxable period ending on or
before the Closing Date, and (B)&#160;for the portion of any Straddle Period
ending at the close of business on the Closing Date (determined as provided in
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a><a href="#_Ref263344845"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(c)</font></a>);
(ii)&#160;any and all Taxes imposed on any member of a consolidated, combined or
unitary group of which the Company (or any predecessor thereof) is or was a
member on or prior to the Closing Date, by reason of the liability of the
Company (or any predecessor thereof), pursuant to United States Treasury
Regulation Section&#160;1.1502-6(a) (or any predecessor or successor thereof or
any analogous or similar provision under state, local or foreign Law);
(iii)&#160;the failure of any of the representations and warranties contained in
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref239173013"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.10</font></a> to be true
and correct in all respects (determined without regard to any qualification
related to materiality contained therein) or the failure to perform any covenant
contained in this Agreement with respect to Taxes; and (iv)&#160;any failure by
the Sellers to timely pay any and all Taxes required to be borne by the Sellers
pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a><a href="#_Ref263359915"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(e)</font></a>; except to
the extent any such Taxes are reflected as a reduction to Closing Working
Capital on the Closing Working Capital Statement.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Filing of Tax Returns;
Payment of Taxes</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">The
Company shall timely file all Tax Returns required to be filed by it on or prior
to the Closing Date and shall pay or cause to be paid all Taxes shown due
thereon.&#160;&#160;All such Tax Returns shall be prepared in a manner
consistent with prior practice; provided, however, that the Company shall not
make any election pursuant to Code Section 59(e) to capitalize any &#8220;qualified
expenditures&#8221; as defined in such Section on the Company&#8217;s federal income tax
return and any applicable state and local income tax returns for the period
ending December 31, 2009 and any other periods ending after December 31, 2009
and on or before the Closing Date.&#160;&#160;The Company shall provide
Purchaser with copies of such completed Tax Returns at least twenty days prior
to the due date for filing thereof, along with supporting workpapers, for
Purchaser&#8217;s review and approval (such approval not to be unreasonably withheld
or delayed).&#160;&#160;The Sellers&#8217; Representatives and Purchaser shall attempt
in good faith to resolve any disagreements regarding such Tax Returns prior to
the due date for filing.&#160;&#160;In the event that the Sellers&#8217;
Representatives and the Purchaser are unable to resolve any dispute with respect
to such Tax Return at least ten days prior to the due date for filing, such
dispute shall be resolved pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a><a href="#_Ref242713096"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(f)</font></a> which
resolution shall be binding on the parties.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Following
the Closing, Purchaser shall cause to be timely filed all Tax Returns required
to be filed by the Company after the Closing Date and, subject to the rights to
payment from the Sellers under <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a><a href="#_Ref242713111"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(b)</font></a><a href="#_Ref242713128"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(iii)</font></a>, pay or
cause to be paid all Taxes shown due thereon.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(iii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Not later
than ten days prior to the due date for the payment of Taxes on any Tax Returns
which Purchaser has the responsibility to cause to be filed pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a><a href="#_Ref242713111"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(b)</font></a><a href="#_Ref242713113"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(ii)</font></a>, the Sellers
shall pay to Purchaser the amount of Taxes, as reasonably determined by
Purchaser, owed by the Sellers pursuant to the provisions of <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a>.&#160;&#160;No</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">69</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">payment
pursuant to this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a><a href="#_Ref242713111"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(b)</font></a><a href="#_Ref242713128"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(iii)</font></a> shall
excuse the Sellers from their indemnification obligations pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a> if the amount
of Taxes as ultimately determined (on audit or otherwise)&#160;for the periods
covered by such Tax Returns exceeds the amount of the Sellers&#8217; payment under
this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a><a href="#_Ref242713111"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(b)</font></a><a href="#_Ref242713128"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(iii)</font></a>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(c)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Straddle Period Tax
Allocation</font>.&#160;&#160;The Company shall, unless prohibited by applicable
Law, close the taxable period of the Company as of the close of business on the
Closing Date.&#160;&#160;If applicable law does not permit the Company to close
its taxable year on the Closing Date or in any case in which a Tax is assessed
with respect to a taxable period which includes the Closing Date (but does not
begin or end on that day) (a &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Straddle Period</font>&#8221;),
the Taxes, if any, attributable to a Straddle Period shall be allocated
(i)&#160;to the Sellers for the period up to and including the close of business
on the Closing Date, except to the extent such Taxes were already accounted for
in the Net Working Capital Adjustment as a reduction to Closing Working Capital
on the Closing Working Capital Statement, and (ii)&#160;to Purchaser for the
period subsequent to the Closing Date.&#160;&#160;Any allocation of income or
deductions required to determine any Taxes attributable to a Straddle Period
shall be made by means of a closing of the books and records of the Company as
of the close of the Closing Date, provided that exemptions, allowances or
deductions that are calculated on an annual basis (including, but not limited
to, depreciation and amortization deductions)&#160;shall be allocated between
the period ending on the Closing Date and the period after the Closing Date in
proportion to the number of days in each such period.&#160;&#160;In the case of
any Taxes of the Company imposed on a periodic basis (including real property
and ad valorem Taxes) the allocation between Purchaser and the Sellers described
in this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a><a href="#_Ref263344845"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(c)</font></a> shall be made
based on the number of days during the Straddle Period on or before the Closing
Date, on the one hand, and the number of days in the Straddle Period after the
Closing Date, on the other hand.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(d)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Tax
Audits</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">If notice
of any Legal Proceeding with respect to Taxes of the Company (a &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Tax Claim</font>&#8221;) shall be
received by either party for which the other party may reasonably be expected to
be liable pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a><a href="#_Ref242786649"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(a)</font></a>, the notified
party shall notify such other party in writing of such Tax Claim; provided,
however, that the failure of the notified party to give the other party notice
as provided herein shall not relieve such failing party of its obligations under
this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a> except to the
extent that the other party is actually and materially prejudiced
thereby.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Purchaser
shall have the right, at the expense of the Sellers to the extent such Tax Claim
is subject to indemnification by the Sellers pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a> hereof, to
represent the interests of the Company in any Tax Claim; provided, that with
respect to a Tax Claim relating exclusively to taxable periods ending on or
before the Closing Date for which Sellers may reasonably be expected to be
liable pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a><a href="#_Ref242786649"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(a)</font></a>, Purchaser
shall not settle such claim without the consent of the Sellers, which consent
shall not be unreasonably withheld.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(e)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Transfer Taxes and Payment
of Other Taxes</font>.&#160;&#160;The Sellers shall severally be liable for and
shall pay (and shall indemnify and hold harmless the Purchaser Indemnified
Parties against)&#160;all sales, use, stamp, documentary, filing, recording,
transfer or similar fees or</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">70</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">taxes or
governmental charges as levied by any Governmental Authority including any
interest and penalties)&#160;in connection with the transactions contemplated by
this Agreement.&#160;&#160;Each Party shall bear all other Taxes arising as a
result or payable in respect of this Agreement or its implementation, all to the
extent such Taxes apply on each Party under applicable law.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(f)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Disputes</font>.&#160;&#160;Any
dispute as to any matter covered hereby shall be resolved by an independent
accounting firm mutually acceptable to the Sellers and the
Purchaser.&#160;&#160;The fees and expenses of such accounting firm shall be
borne equally by the Sellers, on the one hand, and the Purchaser on the
other.&#160;&#160;If any dispute with respect to a Tax Return is not resolved
prior to the due date of such Tax Return, such Tax Return shall be filed in the
manner which the party responsible for preparing such Tax Return deems
correct.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(g)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Time
Limits</font>.&#160;&#160;Any claim for indemnity under this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a> may be made
at any time prior to sixty (60) days after the expiration of the applicable Tax
statute of limitations with respect to the relevant taxable period (including
all periods of extension, whether automatic or permissive).</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(h)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Exclusivity</font>.&#160;&#160;The
indemnification provided for in this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a> shall be the
sole remedy for any claim in respect of Taxes, including any claim arising out
of or relating to a breach of <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref239173013"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">4.10</font></a>.&#160;&#160;In
the event of a conflict between the provisions of this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a>, on the one
hand, and the provisions of <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sections&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711089"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.1</font></a> through <a href="#_Ref242711093"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.3</font></a>, on the
other, the provisions of this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a> shall
control.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Tax Treatment of Indemnity
Payments</font>.&#160;&#160;The Sellers and the Purchaser agree to treat any
indemnity payment made pursuant to this <a href="#_Ref263360319"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ARTICLE III</font></a> as an
adjustment to the Base Purchase Price for all income tax
purposes.&#160;&#160;If, notwithstanding the treatment required by the preceding
sentence, any indemnification payment under <a href="#_Ref263360319"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ARTICLE III</font></a>
(including this <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711098"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.5</font></a>) is
determined to be taxable to the party receiving such payment by any Taxing
Authority, the paying party shall also indemnify the party receiving such
payment for any Taxes incurred by reason of the receipt of such payment and any
Losses incurred by the party receiving such payment in connection with such
Taxes (or any asserted deficiency, claim, demand, action, suit, proceeding,
judgment or assessment, including the defense or settlement thereof, relating to
such Taxes).</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">8.6</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Recourse for Indemnity
Claims</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Any
payment the Sellers are obligated to make to any Purchaser Indemnified Parties
pursuant to this <a href="#_Ref263360365"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ARTICLE IV</font></a> (other
than <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263708263"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.7</font></a> hereof) shall
be paid:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">first, to
the extent there are sufficient funds in the Escrow Account, by release of funds
to the Purchaser Indemnified Parties from the Escrow Account by the Escrow Agent
within five (5) Business Days after the date notice of any sums due and owing is
given to the Sellers (by delivery to the Sellers&#8217; Representatives) (with a copy
to the Escrow Agent pursuant to the Escrow Agreement) by the applicable
Purchaser Indemnified Party and shall accordingly reduce the Escrow Balance;
and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">second,
by withholding of funds from any future Earnout Payments (including from the
portion of any Earnout Payment not constituting an Escrowed Earnout</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>

        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Amount,
such that any Escrowed Earnout Amount will be deposited in the Escrow Account
without prior deduction).</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notwithstanding
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263708289"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.6</font></a><a href="#_Ref261178543"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(a)</font></a>, to the
extent that any Seller is obligated to indemnify any Purchaser Indemnified Party
pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711144"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.2(a)(ii)</font></a>, the
Purchaser Indemnified Parties (i)&#160;shall be permitted (but shall not be
required) to recover such sums due and owing in accordance with the priorities
specified in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263708289"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.6</font></a><a href="#_Ref261178543"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">(a)</font></a>, and may in,
lieu thereof (ii)&#160;require such Seller to pay all sums due and owing to the
Purchaser Indemnified Parties by wire transfer of immediately available funds
within five (5) Business Days after the date of such notice; provided, however,
that, except in the event of fraud or intentional misrepresentation, the maximum
amount the Purchaser Indemnified Parties may recover from any Seller pursuant to
this clause (b) shall not exceed the cash distributions to such Seller pursuant
to this Agreement (including the actual or later release of any Escrow Amount or
any Earnout Payment) (treating any withholding Taxes withheld on amounts paid to
such Seller, or other amounts withheld pre-Tax on amounts otherwise payable to
any Sellers, as if they had been paid to such Seller for this
purpose).</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(c)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">To the
extent that, on the date any Earnout Payment is to be made there exist indemnity
claims which were asserted by the Purchaser Indemnified Parties prior to the
expiration of the applicable Survival Period and which are not yet resolved
(&#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Unresolved
Claims</font>&#8221;) the Purchaser may (but shall not be obligated to) retain an
amount (up to the total amount of the Earnout Payment) equal to the amount of
the Unresolved Claims (subject to the limitations in <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref242711093"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.3</font></a>) but only to
the extent that the amount of such Unresolved Claims exceeds the then-current
Escrow Balance (including any Escrowed Earnout Amount to be deposited into the
Escrow Account in connection with such Earnout Payment(s), if any) which is not
then subject to a notice on account to any prior Unresolved
Claim.&#160;&#160;Any portion of an Earnout Payment retained by Purchaser for
Unresolved Claims shall be released by Purchaser (to the extent not utilized to
pay Purchaser for any such claims resolved in favor of a Purchaser Indemnified
Party) upon their resolution in accordance with this <a href="#_Ref263360470"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">ARTICLE
III</font></a>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">8.7</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Freedom to Operate Payments and
Recourse</font>.&#160;&#160;Except for any Royalty FTO Payments paid by
Purchaser or its Affiliates for any Base Earnout Year in which Deemed Net
Revenue does not exceed Target Net Revenue (which economic burden shall be borne
solely by Purchaser), each of Purchaser and Sellers shall bear fifty percent
(50%) of the economic burden of any FTO Payments in the manner set forth in this
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">&#160;</font><a href="#_Ref263360489"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
 <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">8.7</font></a>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">One-Time FTO
Payments</font>.&#160;&#160;Sellers shall bear the economic burden of fifty
percent of any One-Time FTO Payments as follows:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">first, to
the extent there are sufficient funds in the Escrow Account, by release of funds
equal to fifty percent (50%) of such One-Time FTO Payment to Purchaser from the
Escrow Account by the Escrow Agent within five (5) Business Days after the date
notice of any sums due and owing is given to the Sellers (by delivery to the
Sellers&#8217; Representatives) (with a copy to the Escrow Agent pursuant to the
Escrow Agreement) by Purchaser Indemnified Party and shall accordingly reduce
the Escrow Balance; and</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">72</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>
      </div><br>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br></div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">second,
by withholding of funds from any future Earnout Payments (including from the
portion of any Earnout Payment not constituting an Escrowed Earnout Amount, such
that any Escrowed Earnout Amount will be deposited in the Escrow Account without
prior deduction).</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Royalty FTO
Payments</font>.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(i)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Prior to
the Escrow Release Date Sellers shall bear the economic burden of fifty percent
of any Royalty FTO Payments solely through the deduction from Deemed Gross
Revenue contemplated by clause (ii) of the definition of &#8220;Deemed Net
Revenue.&#8221;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 108pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(ii)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Following
the Escrow Release Date Sellers shall bear the economic burden of fifty percent
(50%) of any Royalty FTO Payments solely by release of funds to Purchaser from
the Escrow Account by the Escrow Agent (no more frequently than on a quarterly
basis) equal to fifty percent (50%) of such Royalty FTO Payments made by
Purchaser (and not previously recovered by Purchaser through an offset against
Deemed Gross Revenue or through a previous release from the Escrow Account), to
the extent there are sufficient funds in the Escrow Account, within five (5)
Business Days after the date notice of any sums due and owing is given to the
Sellers (with a copy to the Escrow Agent pursuant to the Escrow Agreement) by
Purchaser and shall accordingly reduce the Escrow Balance.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(c)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">Notwithstanding
anything herein to the contrary, Sellers shall not be obligated to bear fifty
percent (50%) of the economic burden of any FTO Payments to the extent that such
fifty percent (50%) burden (including by way of offset from Deemed Gross Revenue
in the computation of Deemed Net Revenue pursuant to clause (ii) of the
definition thereof and by way of recourse to the Escrow Account) exceeds in the
aggregate, when aggregated with any indemnifiable Losses which are subject to
the Cap, $200,000,000 (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">FTO
Cap</font>&#8221;).</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">ARTICLE
IX&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">TERMINATION</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">9.1</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Termination of
Agreement</font>.&#160;&#160;This Agreement may be terminated prior to the
Closing as follows:</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(a)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">At the
election of the Sellers&#8217; Representatives or Purchaser on or after the forty-five
(45) day anniversary of the date hereof (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Termination Date</font>&#8221;),
if the Closing shall not have occurred by the close of business on such
anniversary date (other than as a result of the failure to obtain the requisite
approvals pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section </font><a href="#_Ref261202271"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.5(a)</font></a> for
clearance of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement under the HSR Act
in which instance the Termination Date shall be extended to be fifteen (15)
Business Days after clearance is obtained or finally denied without opportunity
for further appeal under the HSR Act), provided that the terminating party is
not in material default of any of its obligations hereunder;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 72pt"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">(b)</font><font id="TAB2" style="COLOR: black; LETTER-SPACING: 9pt">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">At the
election of the Sellers&#8217; Representatives or Purchaser on or after the six (6)
month anniversary of the date hereof, if the Closing shall not have occurred by
the close of business on such anniversary date as a result of the failure to
obtain the requisite approvals pursuant to <font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Section </font><a href="#_Ref261202271"><!--EFPlaceholder-->
<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">6.5(a)</font></a> for
clearance of the transactions contemplated by this Agreement</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div><br>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;</font></div>
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#160;DAL:0506861/00010:1931463v15</font></font></div>
          </div>
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font></div>
        </div>

          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">73</font></div>
